languages.text: {n}Дряхлый старец в задумчивости крутит между пальцев кинжал — лезвие так и пляшет.{/n} "Старый клинок остроты не теряет, ежели закален правильно и заточен бережно, Домин'{name}".
{n}The decrepit old man looks pensive as he twirls a dagger, making it dance between his fingers.{/n} "An old blade, if hardened well and honed with care, does not lose its sharpness, Domin'{name}."
languages.original_text: {n}Дряхлый старец в задумчивости крутит между пальцев кинжал — лезвие так и пляшет.{/n} "Старый клинок остроты не теряет, ежели закален правильно и заточен бережно, Домин'{name}".

traits.locale_text: {n}The decrepit old man pensively twirls the blade, making it dance between his fingers.{/n} "An old blade does not lose its sharpness if hardened properly and honed with care, Enim'{name}".
{n}The decrepit old man pensively twirls the blade, making it dance between his fingers.{/n} "An old blade does not lose its sharpness if hardened properly and honed with care, Enim'{name}".

{n}The decrepit old man looks pensive as he twirls the blade, making it dance between his fingers.{/n} "An old blade does not lose its sharpness if it is hardened properly and honed with care, Enim'{name}".

{n}The decrepit old man looks pensive as he twirls a dagger, making it dance between his fingers.{/n} "An old blade, if hardened well and honed with care, does not lose its sharpness, Domin'{name}."

languages.text: {n}El anciano decrépito parece pensativo y maneja una daga, haciendo que baile entre sus dedos.{/n} «Domin'{name}, una hoja vieja bien cuidada y mantenida no pierde su filo».
languages.original_text: {n}The decrepit old man looks pensive as he twirls a dagger, making it dance between his fingers.{/n} "An old blade, if hardened well and honed with care, does not lose its sharpness, Domin'{name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}El anciano decrépito parece pensativo y maneja una daga, haciendo que baile entre sus dedos.{/n} «Domin'{name}, una hoja vieja bien cuidada y mantenida no pierde su filo».

languages.text: {n}ヨボヨボの老人は物思いにふけりながら短剣をくるくると回し、指の間で躍らせる。{/n} 「古びた刃も、よく鍛えて丹念に研げば、切れ味を失うことはないのだよ、ドミン・{name}」
languages.original_text: {n}The decrepit old man looks pensive as he twirls a dagger, making it dance between his fingers.{/n} "An old blade, if hardened well and honed with care, does not lose its sharpness, Domin'{name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヨボヨボの老人は物思いにふけりながら短剣をくるくると回し、指の間で躍らせる。{/n} 「古びた刃も、よく鍛えて丹念に研げば、切れ味を失うことはないのだよ、エニム・{name}」

languages.text: {n}这位年迈的老人深思般地把玩着匕首，匕首在他的指尖飞舞。{/n}“只要好好锻炼，精心打磨，哪怕是古旧的匕首，也依然会锋利如新，秘者{name}。"
languages.original_text: {n}The decrepit old man looks pensive as he twirls a dagger, making it dance between his fingers.{/n} "An old blade, if hardened well and honed with care, does not lose its sharpness, Domin'{name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}这位年迈的老人深思般地把玩着匕首，匕首在他的指尖飞舞。{/n}“只要好好锻炼，精心打磨，哪怕是古旧的匕首，也依然会锋利如新，秘者{name}。"

languages.text: {n}Der gebrechliche alte Mann lässt nachdenklich einen Dolch zwischen seinen Fingern tanzen.{/n} "Wenn eine alte Klinge, gut gehärtet und sorgsam geschliffen wird, verliert sie ihre Schärfe nicht, Domin'{name}."
languages.original_text: {n}The decrepit old man looks pensive as he twirls a dagger, making it dance between his fingers.{/n} "An old blade, if hardened well and honed with care, does not lose its sharpness, Domin'{name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der gebrechliche alte Mann lässt nachdenklich einen Dolch zwischen seinen Fingern tanzen.{/n} "Wenn eine alte Klinge, gut gehärtet und sorgsam geschliffen wird, verliert sie ihre Schärfe nicht, Domin'{name}."

languages.text: {n}L'air perdu dans ses pensées, le vieil homme fait danser une dague entre ses doigts.{/n} « Si elle a été trempée et entretenue avec soin, même une vieille lame ne perdra jamais de son tranchant, Domin'{name}. »
languages.original_text: {n}The decrepit old man looks pensive as he twirls a dagger, making it dance between his fingers.{/n} "An old blade, if hardened well and honed with care, does not lose its sharpness, Domin'{name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'air perdu dans ses pensées, le vieil homme fait danser une dague entre ses doigts.{/n} « Si elle a été trempée et entretenue avec soin, même une vieille lame ne perdra jamais de son tranchant, Domin'{name}. »

languages.text: {n}Dermansız ihtiyar, hançerini parmakları arasında dans edercesine çevirirken dalgın görünüyor.{/n} "Eski bir kılıç, güzelce dövüldüyse ve dikkatlice bakıldıysa keskinliğini yitirmez Domin'{name}."
languages.original_text: {n}The decrepit old man looks pensive as he twirls a dagger, making it dance between his fingers.{/n} "An old blade, if hardened well and honed with care, does not lose its sharpness, Domin'{name}."
